file_insights.description: Created React Context for AlertDialog components to share dialog state, generated IDs, and event handlers
key_changes: Added state sharing mechanism between dialog components
Leveraged React.useId() for generating unique identifiers
Enabled dynamic ID generation and sharing

patterns_discovered: Centralized state management for dialog components
Dynamic component configuration through shared context
gotchas_discovered: Ensuring unique IDs across multiple dialog instances
Managing complex state sharing between nested components
recommendations: Continue using React Context for complex component interactions
Standardize ID generation strategies across components
Consider adding prop types or TypeScript for stronger type safety
Write comprehensive unit tests for context interactions
Document the context usage patterns for future developers
